name: World Heroes 2
overview: The first battle crossed the barriers of time to find out who was the greatest hero ever, but no clear winner was determined. Now one year later, those 8 great heroes with 8 new challengers have gathered together to settle it once and for all! 14 playable characters with the morphing Neo Geeguse and Dia, the last two bosses that wreaked havoc on you in the arcade, bring this cart to a total of 16 selectable characters, or a total of 128 whopping combinations! Same character select so you can pit heroes against each other for the ultimate dream match! Zoom past other carts, with 3 select-able speed settings. Unique new "Life gauge mask", "Seesaw life gauge", new stages and survival stages (total 23), are all made available to you. Experience the "Counter throw" and the Repelling" features that put this game in a class by itself!
